metric_description: Cloud Spanner API requests. Sampled every 60 seconds. After sampling, data is not visible for up to 120 seconds.
Uncompressed request bytes received by Cloud Spanner. Sampled every 60 seconds. After sampling, data is not visible for up to 120 seconds.
Rate of Cloud Spanner API requests. Sampled every 60 seconds. After sampling, data is not visible for up to 120 seconds.

Distribution of server request latencies for a database. This includes latency of request processing in Cloud Spanner backends and API layer. It does not include network or reverse-proxy overhead between clients and servers. Sampled every 60 seconds. After sampling, data is not visible for up to 120 seconds.
Uncompressed response bytes sent by Cloud Spanner. Sampled every 60 seconds. After sampling, data is not visible for up to 120 seconds.
Backup storage used in bytes. Sampled every 60 seconds. After sampling, data is not visible for up to 120 seconds.

24-hour smoothed utilization of provisioned CPU. Values are typically numbers between 0.0 and 1.0 (but might exceed 1.0), charts display the values as a percentage between 0% and 100% (or more). Sampled every 60 seconds. After sampling, data is not visible for up to 120 seconds.

Percent utilization of provisioned CPU. Values are typically numbers between 0.0 and 1.0 (but might exceed 1.0), charts display the values as a percentage between 0% and 100% (or more). Sampled every 60 seconds. After sampling, data is not visible for up to 120 seconds.

Percent utilization of provisioned CPU, by operation type. Values are typically numbers between 0.0 and 1.0 (but might exceed 1.0), charts display the values as a percentage between 0% and 100% (or more). Currently, it does not include CPU utilization for system tasks. Sampled every 60 seconds. After sampling, data is not visible for up to 120 seconds.

Percent utilization of provisioned CPU, by priority. Values are typically numbers between 0.0 and 1.0 (but might exceed 1.0), charts display the values as a percentage between 0% and 100% (or more). Sampled every 60 seconds. After sampling, data is not visible for up to 120 seconds.
Total number of nodes. Sampled every 60 seconds. After sampling, data is not visible for up to 120 seconds.
Total number of processing units. Sampled every 60 seconds. After sampling, data is not visible for up to 120 seconds.
Number of sessions in use. Sampled every 60 seconds. After sampling, data is not visible for up to 120 seconds.
Storage limit for instance in bytes. Sampled every 60 seconds. After sampling, data is not visible for up to 120 seconds.
Storage limit per processing unit in bytes. Sampled every 60 seconds. After sampling, data is not visible for up to 120 seconds.
Storage used in bytes. Sampled every 60 seconds. After sampling, data is not visible for up to 120 seconds.
Storage used as a fraction of storage limit. Sampled every 60 seconds. After sampling, data is not visible for up to 120 seconds.
Count of queries by database name, status, query type, and used optimizer version. Sampled every 60 seconds. After sampling, data is not visible for up to 120 seconds.
